auth_note: Thank you for choosing AlKhadra United Company. Please verify your email by clicking the link sent to you,then please wait until we activate your account
terms_conditions_note: By tapping Sign up you accept all

commercial_no_error: Commercial Registration no. must be 10 numbers
not_match_pass: Password doesn't match, please try again

pick_location_note: Click the map to select your location
add_branch_note_dialog: Thank you for choosing Al-Kharda app, to continue your shopping process please add your branch information, Do you want to add it now or later ?

code_not_match: Wrong code, please check your email or click resend code to get a new code

address_required: Please Pick The branch address from the Map
waiting_approval: Thank you for choosing AlKhadra United Company. please wait until we activate your account
worng_password: Wrong Password , if you forget your password click forget password below
worng_syntax_password: Make sure your password at least 6 and at max 50 characters long. It must have at least one non alphanumeric character, at least one digit ('0'-'9'), at least one lowercase('a' - 'z') and at least one uppercase('A' - 'Z')
add_location_note: Please click add location to get your exact location, you can edit the printed address after picking your location
continue_add_branch_note_dialog: Are you sure you want to continue canceling the process of adding your branch information?
continue_edit_branch_note_dialog: Are you sure you want to continue canceling the process of editing your branch information?
continue_delete_branch_note_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to delete this branch permanently ?
Your Order is On The Way!: Your Order is On The Way!
no_result: No products matched your search, please try again with another term
no_fav_product: You don't have any favourite products
no_items_in_cart: There are no Items in your cart

cart_qty_changed_note: Some product quantity have been changed in your cart due to unavailability, Please review your cart before checkout
cart_qty_price_changed_note: Some product prices and quantity have changed in your cart, Please review your cart before checkout
select_branch_note: Please Select the branch you want to deliver to , the branch address will be appear in the address field, you can make changes to the address
